meanings.sent1: The teacher clarified the misconstructions in the students' essays.
meanings.sent2: The book aimed to correct common misconstructions about history.
meanings.sent3: The mix-up caused by misconstructions led to a funny misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Her misconstructions of the rules made the game more challenging.
meanings.sent5: The detective's job was to unravel the misconstructions in the case.

meanings.definition: Faulty or mistaken constructions or structures
meanings.sent1: The architect had to fix the misconstructions in the building's design.
meanings.sent2: The safety inspector pointed out the misconstructions in the bridge.
meanings.sent3: The misconstructions in the puzzle made it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: The misconstructions in the plan caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent5: The repairman had to address the misconstructions in the faulty machinery.
